description.zh-cn: 中国教育界人士，汉族，中国共产党党员。现任合肥幼儿师范高等专科学校校长。主要从事图论与网络优化领域研究工作。
description.en: Chinese educator, Han ethnicity, member of the Communist Party of China. She is the current president of Hefei Preschool Education College. Her main research field is graph theory and network optimization.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省下辖的县级市，由安庆市代管。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Anqing City, in Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省安庆市的一所省属师范大学。
description.en: A provincial normal university located in Anqing, Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省芜湖市的一所省属重点大学。
description.en: A provincial key university located in Wuhu, Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的一所综合性大学，是国家“双一流”建设高校。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Hefei, Anhui Province, China, and part of the national 'Double First Class' initiative.

nodes.id: 合肥幼儿师范高等专科学校

zh-cn: 合肥幼儿师范高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的一所公办全日制普通高等专科学校。
description.en: A public full-time ordinary higher vocational college located in Hefei, Anhui Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 由美国数学学会出版的期刊和在线数据库，包含了数学、统计学和理论计算机科学领域的文献摘要和评论。
description.en: A journal and online database published by the American Mathematical Society that contains summaries and reviews of literature in mathematics, statistics, and theoretical computer science.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育界人士，余桂东的前任合肥幼儿师范高等专科学校校长。
description.en: Chinese educator, predecessor of Yu Guidong as the president of Hefei Preschool Education College.

description.zh-cn: 出生于安徽省潜山县（现潜山市）。
description.en: Born in Qianshan County (now Qianshan City), Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 余桂东是一名中国共产党党员。
description.en: Yu Guidong is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1997年毕业于安庆师范学院（现安庆师范大学）数学系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Mathematics at Anqing Teachers College (now Anqing Normal University) in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 2006年于安徽师范大学获硕士学位。
description.en: Obtained a master's degree from Anhui Normal University in 2006.
Obtained a doctorate from Anhui University in 2012.

position.zh-cn: 教师、教授、数学与计算科学学院党委委员、副院长
position.en: Teacher, Professor, Party Committee Member and Deputy Dean of the School of Mathematics and Computational Science

description.zh-cn: 1997年毕业后留校任教，后晋升教授，并曾担任数学与计算科学学院党委委员、副院长，直至2018年5月调任。
description.en: After graduating in 1997, she stayed at the university to teach, was later promoted to professor, and served as a Party Committee member and Deputy Dean of the School of Mathematics and Computational Science until her transfer in May 2018.

relationships.target: 合肥幼儿师范高等专科学校

description.zh-cn: 2018年5月任合肥幼儿师范高等专科学校副校长，2022年5月升任校长。
description.en: Appointed as Vice President of Hefei Preschool Education College in May 2018, and promoted to President in May 2022.
Serves as a reviewer for the American 'Mathematical Reviews'.

description.zh-cn: 2022年5月，余桂东接替方东玲，出任合肥幼儿师范高等专科学校校长。
description.en: In May 2022, Yu Guidong succeeded Fang Dongling as the president of Hefei Preschool Education College.
